snippet: All but one household in Sodeto, Spain, held at least a piece of a winning ticket in the Christmas lottery’s huge first prize of $950 million, the biggest ever.
abstract: Sodeto Journal; all but one household in the village of Sodeto, Spain, hold a piece of a winning ticket in the country's Christmas lottery first prize of $950 million; the villagers' good fortune has a downside, however, drawing salespeople, bankers and other fortune seekers who aim to separate the villagers from their winnings.
lead_paragraph: All but one household in Sodeto, Spain, held at least a piece of a winning ticket in the Christmas lottery’s huge first prize of $950 million, the biggest ever.

headline.seo: Tiny Village of Sodeto Wins Big in Spain’s Lottery
headline.main: In Spanish Village, Everyone’s a Winner, Almost
headline.print_headline: In Spanish Village, Everyone’s a Winner, Almost
